Title: Chapter Three
Writer: Olan Rogers (developed for television by), David Sacks (developed for television by), Olan Rogers (created by), Olan Rogers, David Sacks, Alyssa Lane, Alex J. Sherman, Jane Becker (executive story editor), Alyssa Lane (story editor), Alex J. Sherman (story editor)
Actors: Fred Armisen, Tom Kenny, Olan Rogers, Tika Sumpter
Plot: Gary tries to hide Mooncake safely away on the planet Yarno. But instead, Gary and Avocato are trapped in a terrifying mind-puzzle, while Mooncake is taken from them, and forced to fight in a combat arena called the Deathcropolis.
